About Me

Hi. there.

I’m very interested in society and the environment.

So I’ve been involved in related activities and campaigns for a long time.

And now I’m going to try to be professional in thinking about the earth, not a hobby.

Please look forward to working as an ESG expert in various fields!

Experience

Wepublic DAO HwanSangClub

Environmentally conscious plogging groups and activities

April 2024 - May 2024

"Together, we strive to save the environment."

Wepublic DAO HwanSangClub is a non-profit organization dedicated to environmental conservation and sustainable development. The group I participated in aims to address environmental pollution issues through an activity known as plogging.

I contributed to projects aimed at sustainable development, thereby making a positive impact on environmental protection. Through this experience, I enhanced my awareness of environmental issues and developed the ability to take practical action.

Censia Campaign

Walking donation campaign (support medical expenses for vulnerable people with poor leg health)

October 2023

"Every step counts towards a healthier future."

The Censia Campaign was a walking donation initiative aimed at supporting the medical expenses of vulnerable individuals suffering from poor leg health. Participants were encouraged to walk a certain distance, and sponsors would donate funds based on the distance covered.

I was actively involved in organizing and promoting this campaign, coordinating with local communities and healthcare organizations to raise awareness and gather support. Through this experience, I witnessed the power of collective action in making a positive impact on the lives of those in need.

Korea Western Power Co., Ltd. and Save the Children Campaign

Together Value Pickup Plogging Campaign (Food Support Campaign for Children Without Meals)

November 2022

"Join us in creating a brighter future for children in need."

The Korea Western Power Co., Ltd. and Save the Children Campaign was a collaborative effort to organize the Together Value Pickup Plogging Campaign, aimed at providing food support for children without meals.

Korea Lou Gehrig's Disease Association Campaign

Root Challenge, a campaign to donate to Lou Gehrig's disease patients by tracking

July 2022

"One step at a time, we can make a world of difference."

The Korea Lou Gehrig’s Disease Association Campaign initiated the Root Challenge, a unique fundraising campaign aimed at supporting patients suffering from Lou Gehrig’s disease.

Participants in this campaign were encouraged to track their physical activities, such as walking or running, and for each mile covered, sponsors would make donations to assist patients with medical expenses and research efforts.

SK Incheon Petrochemical Co., Ltd Campaign

Hi walk together season 5 Happy companion with the visually impaired (a challenge to support the visually impaired portable braille version)

June 2022

"Walking hand in hand towards a more inclusive future."

SK Incheon Petrochemical Co., Ltd organized the Hi walk together season 5 campaign, aimed at fostering companionship and support for the visually impaired community.

It was heartening to see the enthusiasm and dedication of participants as we worked towards a more inclusive society. Through this campaign, we not only raised awareness about the challenges faced by the visually impaired but also took tangible steps towards providing solutions and support.

KOREA EAST-WEST POWER Campaign

New Warm Walk Donation EWP Energy 1004 Project 9th Story Dangjin Jogeum Elementary School

March 2021

"Walking towards a brighter future, one step at a time."

The KOREA EAST-WEST POWER Campaign launched the New Warm Walk Donation EWP Energy 1004 Project in collaboration with the 9th Story Dangjin Jogeum Elementary School.

This initiative aimed to provide warmth and support to the local community by distributing energy resources and essential supplies. As part of the campaign, volunteers engaged in walking activities to raise awareness and gather donations for those in need.

Chungbuk National University Affiliated Middle School

Educational service for underprivileged students

June 2014

"Empowering tomorrow's leaders through education."

Chungbuk National University Affiliated Middle School offered educational services aimed at supporting underprivileged students in their academic pursuits.

As a volunteer, I participated in various activities such as tutoring sessions, mentoring programs, and extracurricular workshops. These initiatives were designed to provide additional educational support and opportunities for students who may face socio-economic challenges.

Through my involvement, I witnessed the transformative power of education in empowering young minds and creating pathways to success. It was a rewarding experience to contribute to the academic growth and development of these students, helping them realize their full potential.

Education

ChungBuk University

BS Chemistry Of Education

2012 - 2019

"Education is the key to unlocking endless possibilities."

ChungBuk University provided me with a comprehensive education in Chemistry of Education, equipping me with the knowledge and skills necessary to pursue a career in the field.

Throughout my studies, I engaged in rigorous coursework, laboratory experiments, and research projects that deepened my understanding of chemical principles and educational methodologies. I also had the opportunity to collaborate with faculty members and fellow students on various academic initiatives, further enriching my learning experience.

My time at ChungBuk University not only broadened my academic horizons but also instilled in me a passion for lifelong learning and a commitment to making a positive impact in the field of education.
